title: Web-Based Flipped Learning Model Design to Address Higher Education Inequality

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with digital learning tools and foundational knowledge in specialized fields (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Implementation of online lecture models to provide flexible learning environments using personal devices and reduce regional educational disparities

learning_goals: Learners can autonomously analyze web-based materials in a flipped learning environment and apply them to discussion topics.
Learners can complete a collaborative project proposing solutions to educational inequality through a peer feedback system.
Learners can complete 15-minute microlearning modules in a mobile environment and achieve an average score of at least 80% on real-time quizzes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
